clause.title: Arithmetic operators
clause.paragraph: The *, /, %, +, and -operators are called the arithmetic operators. multiplicative-expression : unary-expressionmultiplicative-expression*unary-expressionmultiplicative-expression/unary-expressionmultiplicative-expression%unary-expressionadditive-expression : multiplicative-expressionadditive-expression+multiplicative-expressionadditive-expression-multiplicative-expression
